mapper.select: select a.*,DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTimeStr FROM interactLogs a where a.id<${id} and a.userIdA=#{userId} order by a.id desc limit 5
select a.*,DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTimeStr FROM interactLogs a where a.id<${id} and a.userIdB=#{userId} and a.userIdA!=#{userId} order by a.id desc limit 5
select count(1) FROM interactLogs where userIdA=#{userIdA} and eventType=1 and date(createTime)=date(now())
select count(1) FROM interactLogs where userIdA=#{userIdA} and userIdB!=#{userIdA} and eventType=7 and date(createTime)=date(now())
select count(1) from interactLogs where userIdB=#{userIdB} and eventType=1
select count(1) FROM interactLogs where createTime>#{daystamp} and userCarId=#{userCarId} and eventType=7
